actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: Resolution amending paragraph 4(f) of rule XLII of the Standing Rules of the Senate relating to authority of the Select Committee on Ethics to grant extensions of time for filing financial disclosure reports.

summary.text: Amends rule XLII of the Standing Rules of the Senate to allow the Senate Select Committee on Ethics to grant extensions of time for filing financial disclosure reports pursuant to rule XLII (Financial Disclosure) or rule XLIV (outside Earned Income).

titles.title: Resolution amending paragraph 4(f) of rule XLII of the Standing Rules of the Senate relating to authority of the Select Committee on Ethics to grant extensions of time for filing financial disclosure reports.
